Item.Description:
The perfect kit for anyone - amateur semipro or professional photographer. Canon 40 D with travel bag 400 W seconds limestone flash pack battery, Quantum X 2- 400 W second flash. The Lumedyme comes with an Ultra battery good for over 400 flashes on a single charge at full power. Also comes with battery charger. The quantum Q flash model X2 is in perfect working condition comes with front panel diffuser. The Canon 40 D camera also comes with the optica battery grip which can hold two batteries comes with two batteries and one charger. Also has Canon 28 to 80 mm F3 .5 to 5.6 lens and lens cap. The camera is in perfect working condition and near mint physical condition. As a bonus you also get the camera flip bracket by Strobo frame perfect for 35mm or medium format cameras. Just unpack and you're ready to go. This is the perfect kit for any location or sports photographer charge it up and ready to go.

Contact if winner for shipping options if these do not work for you.

Posted with eBay Mobile
Item.Title: Canon 40D Location & Sports Kit
